tool_description: this api takes URLs and returns downloadable QR codes
title: qr code from urls

api_list.name: qr image
api_list.description: The only endpoint for this API is /api/qrcode, which accepts a GET request and expects a url parameter in the query string. The url parameter should contain the URL that you want to encode as a QR code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-from-urls.p.rapidapi.com/qr"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-from-urls.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
